paper_title.en: Semantics of a Simple Coordination Language by Relational Strings

description.ja: The purpose of this study is to apply the denotational semantics of the coordination language to the safety analysis of parallel programs. In this paper, the denotational semantics of a simple coordination language is defined by relational strings, which are strings of binary relations, and the concatenation of relational strings is a timed-composition of binary relations.

paper_title.en: Relational aspects of relational database dependencies

description.ja: This paper presents a relational treatment of inference rules for functional and multivalued dependencies in relational databases, to show the soundness and the completeness of the inference rules in Dedekind categories, which also cover the fuzzy case.

description.en: The mathematical foundations of fuzzy set theory has been studied related to logics and category theory. This note try to introduce a taste of relational methods in fuzzy set theory.
